snippet: Mayor Angel Taveras said that without reduced city pensions and a switch to Medicare for retirees, Providence would run out of money in June.
abstract: Mayor Angel Taveras of Providence, RI, says that without reduced city pensions and a switch to Medicare for retirees, Providence will run out of money in June; calls for bigger contributions from major tax-exempt universities and hospitals in city for additional help.

byline.original: By JESS BIDGOOD and ABBY GOODNOUGH

lead_paragraph: Mayor Angel Taveras said that without reduced city pensions and a switch to Medicare for retirees, Providence would run out of money in June.

headline.seo: Providence, R.I., Mayor Proposes Cuts to Avert Bankruptcy
headline.main: Mayor of Providence Seeks Urgent Steps in City’s Financial Crisis
headline.print_headline: Mayor of Providence Seeks Urgent Steps in City’s Financial Crisis
